sentences.en: After enduring the hardship of the arduous fieldwork , the prospecting team discovered many new ores.
sentences.cn: 地质勘探队员餐风饮露,历尽辛苦, 找到了不少新的矿藏.

sentences.en: Be competent for fieldwork, good hands - on skills, and willing to travel.
sentences.cn: 能胜任现场工作, 动手能力强, 愿意出差.

sentences.en: Digging locale's environment is execrable, so it is unsuitable for operator's fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 挖掘现场环境恶劣, 操作人员不宜在现场工作.

sentences.en: I got some local ancient contract books when I do fieldwork in Mei county.
sentences.cn: 作者在梅县获见一批地方古契书.

sentences.en: In a few years he would be getting too old for the hard fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 再过几年,他就要老了,不能再做这种艰苦的野外作业了.

sentences.en: In those days they could not spare the children from fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 那时候,孩子不到地里干活是不行的.

sentences.en: Less noise and fuel consumption, meets the need of fieldwork, housing and travelling.
sentences.cn: 减少噪音和燃料消耗, 满足了田野, 房屋及交通费用.

sentences.en: Methods: The methods of epidemiological survey and fieldwork sampling were applied to find out the aetiology.
sentences.cn: 方法采用流行病学调查和现场采集样品检测的方法,综合分析,寻找原因.

sentences.en: Methods: To research Xenopsylla Cheopis distribution area and vector role, etc. in the laboratory and fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 方法通过鼠疫流行现场调查和实验室研究致痒蚤的分布范围、媒介作用的各项指标.

sentences.en: She went out on back of a motorcycle and didrigorous fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 现场调查工作是很艰苦的,可是她骑上摩托车就去.

sentences.en: The composition, work theory, fieldwork method and exploration effect of pulse transient electromagnetic system are introduced.
sentences.cn: 简述了脉冲瞬变电磁系统的组成 、 工作原理 、 野外工作方法及其找矿效果.

sentences.en: This comparison, of course, must be based on solid fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 当然, 这种比较必须建立在坚实的实地研究的基础上.

sentences.en: This fieldwork brings a new example for the studies of matrilineal system.
sentences.cn: 这一调查结果为人类学对母系制的研究提供了新的田野样本.

sentences.en: This plant is available for machining steel pipe's sample grooves in fieldwork.
sentences.cn: 该设备适用于钢管的现场刻槽.

sentences.en: Year in year out he has been doing fieldwork in the Northwest.
sentences.cn: 他长年累月在大西北从事野外工作.

trans.tran_cn: 野战工事，野外工作，实地调查，现场工作
trans.tran_en: the study of scientific or social subjects, done outside the class or  laboratory
